name: Hyobok Ahn
bio: I'm specialized on Tizen & Tizen RT porting to custom board hardware, I have experience to support design IoT gateway and sensor device with public Cloud such as Samsung SmartThings, AWS.

name: Johnny Nam
bio: I participated in Tizen Driver porting task for Wlan/BT/Codec and iot devices development project performed various Scenario Based. And i joined network audio project controlled by voice using Amazon Alexa and network door lock project that can check remotely visitor identification and door lock control under Amazon Cloud platform.

name: Jinseog Bang
bio: Jinseok Bang 는 IoT 복합 Sensor 의 data 축소 통신에 관심을 가지고 있다. 	            이전 직장 에서 복합 sensor hardware project 를 진행 했으며 zigbee 와 ble 를 이용한 Sensor data 수집을 위한 hardware 제작 경험이 있다. 현재 make space 에서 Hardware start-up 엑셀러레이팅 컨설팅 업무를 하고 있다
